column1: john l. moseley| john l. moseley. born: february 22
column8: 2015 at mc. laren macomb hospital in mount clemens
column9: mi. he was born on february 22
column10: 1953 in mt. clemens to charles moseley and the late donna (forton) moseley. on july 28
column12: he was united in marriage to the former anna m. steinhauer. together they have shared nearly 38 years of marriage. john worked as a press operator at ford motor company for 30 years
column13: retiring in 2008. he was an avid bowler
column14: constantly pursuing the 300 game a feat he mastered one time! he also enjoyed spending time with his family
column16: and working in his yard. he could often be found relaxing with his canine companions ginger and carnie. he will be missed by his wife anna
column27: and many nieces and nephews. visitation will be held in the harold w. vick funeral home
column31: 2015 from 2:00 p. m. until 8:00 p. m. funeral services will be held on thursday
column33: 2015 (time pending) in the funeral home. burial will be in pioneer cemetery on friday
column36: mi (time pending). memorial donations may be sent to the wishes of the family. share memories with the family or express condolences at www. vickfuneralhome. com. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
